attention to details
Partners

We take pride in collaborating with leading manufacturers of collectible coins. Developing new
coins and creating high-quality 3D models based on provided sketches.

By partnering with us, our clients can be assured that every detail will bemeticulously crafted,
and their ideas and concepts will be realized with theutmost quality.

Art of coins
Art of coins is famous for incredibly high relief and we have created for them 3d models of several coins, which have completed the collections of many connoisseurs of numismatics.
MINOTAUR Great

This spectacular 3 Oz Silver coin isthe third issue in the "Divine FacesOf The Sun" series and is dedicatedto Helios, the Greek god of the sun.

MERMAID

Introducing a coin dedicated to the famous ship known as the "Victory," which played a significant role in the maritime history and great victories of Admiral Nelson. This ship symbolizes strength, courage, and unwavering determination associated with the era of the Great Oceans and naval battles. The coin features a majestic depiction of the Victory, ready to face any challenge, with meticulous attention to detail to capture its magnificence and historical significance. This coin serves as a tribute to glorious triumphs and honors the grandeur of naval forces and their enduring legacy. Add this unique coin to your collection and experience the spirit of maritime adventures and greatness.
